Package com.platform.user.internal

package com.platform.user.internal
  • Class
    Description
    DemoUserManagementService
    Service for managing demo users and organizations for testing purposes.
    DemoUserManagementService.OrganizationInfo
    DTO for organization information to avoid exposing internal entities.
    DemoUserManagementService.UserInfo
    DTO for user information to avoid exposing internal entities.
    Invitation
    Invitation entity for organization member invitations.
    Invitation.Status
    Invitation status enumeration
    InvitationRepository
    Repository interface for Invitation entity operations.
    InvitationView
    Read-only projection of Invitation for API layer.
    MapToJsonConverter
    JPA converter for Mapinvalid input: '<'String, Object> to JSON string conversion.
    Organization
    Organization entity for multi-tenant isolation and team management.
    Organization.Status
    Organization status enumeration
    OrganizationMember
    Many-to-many relationship entity between Users and Organizations with role information.
    OrganizationMember.Role
    Available organization roles
    OrganizationMember.Status
    Member status enumeration
    OrganizationMemberRepository
    Repository interface for OrganizationMember entity operations.
    OrganizationMemberView
    Read-only projection of OrganizationMember for API layer.
    OrganizationRepository
    Repository interface for Organization entity operations.
    OrganizationService
    Service for managing organization operations and team collaboration.
    OrganizationService.OrganizationMemberInfo
    Organization member information DTO
    OrganizationView
    Read-only projection of Organization to avoid exposing JPA entity to API layer.
    User
    User entity representing authenticated users in the system.
    User.AuthenticationMethod
    Authentication method enumeration
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for User entity operations.
    UserService
    Service for managing user operations with tenant context awareness.
    UserService.UserStatistics
    User statistics data class
    UserView
    Read-only projection of User for API responses.
